body: Mathematics has always come easily for you, and you have always been able to "see the math" in the physical and magical world. You gain a +1 bonus on Knowledge (arcana) and Knowledge (engineering) checks, and one of these skills (your choice) is always a class skill for you.
name: Mathematical Prodigy
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Basic Traits/Magic Traits/Mathematical Prodigy
